price: Dijeron: "¡Oh, Noé! Si no dejas de insultar a nuestros ídolos te lapidaremos [hasta la muerte]".
arabic: قَالُواْ لَئِن لَّمۡ تَنتَهِ يَٰنُوحُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمَرۡجُومِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū la-in lam tantahi yānūḥu latakūnanna mina al-marjūmīna
